thought: To craft prismarine_bricks, I need to place 9 prismarine_shards in the crafting grid. There are 9 prismarine_shards in slot 25, and therefore I will move 1 prismarine_shard from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1
